text:
You start automatically in the STATE LEVEL panel.
Check the other panels to look into other level analysis
Choose from 50 states including the District of Columbia to visualize state trend and select from four narrative voice options to refine the heat map.
Some graphs are interactive. Use the moose to hover or zoom. Reset settings in the upper right.
Always look out for the <b>option buttons under graphs and tables. Most of ElectionGPT functionality is here! <b>
That's it. Enjoy useing ElectionGPT and don't hesitate ton contact us if you have suggestions or comments.
